name: demultiplex-ngs
title: NGS Demultiplexing (nf-core/demultiplex)
description: Demultiplex sequencing data from Illumina platforms. Separates pooled samples by barcodes/indices into individual FASTQ files for downstream analysis. Essential preprocessing step for multiplexed sequencing runs.
content:
NGS Demultiplexing

The nf-core/demultiplex pipeline separates pooled sequencing samples by their barcodes/indices into individual FASTQ files. Essential first step for multiplexed sequencing runs.

Applications

  • Separate samples from multiplexed Illumina runs
  • Handle single and dual indexing
  • Support for various index formats
  • Quality metrics and statistics

Perfect for: Core facilities • Sequencing centers • Any multiplexed NGS project
